actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: Makes two attacks: one with bite and one with tail.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: If cloaker has Advantage, it attaches; while attached, target is blinded and grappled (escape DC 14), attacks against cloaker have disadvantage.

actions.name: Moan
actions.description: Each creature within 60 ft. that can hear must succeed on DC 13 WIS save or become frightened for 1 minute. Repeat save at end of turns.

actions.name: Phantasms (Recharges after Short or Long Rest)
actions.description: Creates 4 illusory duplicates for 1 minute; duplicates move with it and impose a miss chance similar to mirror image.
